items.title: Baseus’ regularly $80 portable tire inflator is down to just $20 today and comes with FREE MagSafe mount for your phone
items.summary:
Baseus portable Tire Inflator

Buy for $20 (Reg. $80)

Enter promo code 7SMJGGBG for $20 off + FREE MagSafe car mount offer.

What we love

This mini tire inflator is a small portable air pump you can keep in your car. It helps you add air to flat or low pressure tires without going to a service station, and you can even use it for bike tires, footballs/basketballs and other small inflatables. It has a built-in battery to work wirelessly without external power, and it also has a display to show the pressure as it fills so you don’t overinflate. ￼

items.summary: BRUSSELS, Jan 20 (Reuters) - The ‌time for flattering Donald Trump is over and Europe should hit back hard economically if ‌the U.S. imposes tariffs on NATO allies that sent troops to Greenland, ex-NATO boss ‌and former Danish Prime Minister Anders Fogh Rasmussen said on Tuesday. items.title: Star Wars Outlaws + Season Pass content for Nintendo Switch 2 down at $30 (50% off), more
items.summary:
If you’re still looking to land a copy of Star Wars Outlaws, the Gold Edition for Nintendo Switch 2 is currently sitting down at $30 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35 via Amazon. This one launched for Nintendo’s latest last year at $60 as the Gold Edition that includes the base game as well as the season pass that comes with Wild Card story pack, A Pirate’s Fortune story pack, Jabba’s Gambit exclusive Day 1 mission, The Kessel Runner character pack, The Hunter’s Legacy bundle, and The Cartel Ronin bundle. Today’s deal is matching the lowest price we have tracked on Amazon and joins a host of ongoing Switch game deals you’ll find below. 

  • Little Nightmares III Switch 2 $30 (Reg. $40)
  • Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Nintendo Switch 2 Edition $65 (Reg. $70)
  • New Super Mario Bros U Deluxe $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Paper Mario: The Origami King $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Fire Emblem Engage Standard $42 (Reg. $60)
  • The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD $42 (Reg. $60)
  • Kirby’s Return to Dream Land Deluxe $42 (Reg. $60)
  • Donkey Kong Bananza $63 (Reg. $70)
  • Big Brain Academy: Brain vs. Brain $24 (Reg. $30)
  • Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Shovel Knight: Treasure Trove $25 (Reg. $40)
  • JUST DANCE 2026 $24 (Reg. $50)
  • And even more…

items.title: Originally $150 Logitech G PRO X SUPERLIGHT wireless gaming mouse is down to $70
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Logitech’s G PRO X SUPERLIGHT wireless gaming mouse down to $70 shipped. This is originally a $150 model that has fetched as much as $110 in recent months at Amazon. Today’s deal, however, shaves an additional $30 off to mark one of the lowest prices we have tracked for it. We saw this model drop to $80 last month during the holiday sale, but today’s deal shaves an additional $10 off. Only once before today have we seen this mouse go for less than today’s discounted price when it briefly hit $50, and it’s now within $20 of that. You can also get this in white, although it’s currently fetching its full $120 price. Head below for more details.
